::Slayer/Ramulus::

A knife passes an inch in front of Slayer's face, the bot stopping to 
turn and fire a missile in BlueStreak's location. He fires his optic 
lasers after the missile, something siddenly hitting him in the head.

Slayer stumbles back from Ramulus' kick, tripping over SnowCat. He 
jumps to his feet in time to avoid another kick from the Maximal, 
growling as he sends a punch at him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Bluestreak/Andromeda/Bludgeon:::
>

Andromeda.

and
